name: FCS_STAGING_DEFS
description: This table contains information from the Cancer Staging Definitions (FCS) record for each kind of cancer to be staged, such as the type of FCS record, a list of fields that should be available for editing, and which SmartLists to use for restricting entry in those fields.

columns.name: STG_DEF_ID
columns.description: The ID of the FCS record containing the Cancer Staging Definitions for a kind of cancer to be staged.

columns.name: STG_DEF_NAME
columns.description: The name of the FCS record containing the Cancer Staging Definitions for a kind of cancer to be staged.

columns.name: FCS_DISP_NAME_VIRTUAL
columns.description: The calculated staging form display name considering based record and possible linked override record.
